name: I'm In A Pickle!
description:
Play as a young planet Earth who's really clumsy, causing troubles whenever he walks.

Controls
Arrow keys to move
Escape key to restart game

I'm In A Pickle! is a lighthearted experience and an experimental game, aimed to bring unusual gameplay mechanics. Toss buildings, cars and trees to get as much scores as you can under 30 seconds. Suitable for players of all ages!

Design & Programming: Joshua Yau
Art: Gan ZinJer
Music: Benjamin Burnes
SFX: phmiller42, bareform, sheepfilms from Freesound.org | EpicSoundFX from YouTube

Additional Credits
Danielle Yau for the idea of literal thinking with small world
Seyvaq Singh for the planet character idea and design thoughts
@AwesomeDannyRay for the design thoughts
Nicholas Tan for helping out when I had programming problems

Made during #LD38 #LDJam #LudumDare in 72 hours with the theme "Small World". Feedback is most welcomed!
